name: Shelly's Ship
description:
<<IMPORTANT BUG NOTE (See "BUG NOTES' section below)>>

A bite sized game about a young adventurer and a ghost pirate captain!
Leaf just moved to a place with a big open space behind her house.  With her papa's
ocarina round her neck and her trusty stuffed darg, Barko, she's going out on her own
towards adventure- "Imagination with all her heart".   

---CONTROLS---

Movement:     up: [W]      right: [D]      down: [S]      left: [A]
Inspect or Talk-to: [spacebar]
Access Inventory: [E ] 
Scroll Inventory descriptions: [W and S]
Continue Through dialogue: [mouse left click]
Draw: [mouse left click]
Exit Draw Mode: [Enter]

---BUG NOTES---

Read the following before playing to ensure full play through!
-When you get to the ship, DO NOT walk over to the right (to the flag on the
ground) first.  Start with the pizza box, then you can go to the right (the flag on the
ground), theeen go to the table.  Do them in that order and you should have no
problem getting to the TRUE (only) ending.
-DO NOT press [ENTER] when you are at the table / lunchbox!! It will close the mini
game and lock you from the ending.
-Try not to move around while in dialogue.  It is not intended to be allowed. 

---MISC. NOTES---

-Feel free to take a snapshot of the 'pizza wheel' you draw and share it! (no NSFW)
-Feedback is welcome. There are many low-hanging fruit to critique (not fixed for lack
of time), but still- feedback appreciated! 
-Thank you for playing!! =}
